quote: Life will hack off your head and shit down your neck every chance it gets. I've found that consuming drugs and booze, listening to music and always having an excuse in the best way to tip the scales.
quote_letters: LIFE WILL HACK OFF YOUR HEAD AND SHIT DOWN YOUR NECK EVERY CHANCE IT GETS IVE FOUND THAT CONSUMING DRUGS AND BOOZE LISTENING TO MUSIC AND ALWAYS HAVING AN EXCUSE IN THE BEST WAY TO TIP THE SCALES
